Diffs GUIbits 0.7 to GUIbits 1.0
--------------------------------
RNB 17 Apr 23  12:34

 1. The underlying GUI package is now PyQt6.
 
 2. New CTRL Action codes have been added to "controlling":
      CTRL_S, CTRL_X, CTRL_C, CTRL_V, CTRL_Z 

 3. A "painting" contractor has been added.  At the moment, only rectangles can be painted.
 
 4. writing.clear_text and painting.clear_rectangles have been added.
